data.persona: I am a King who rules a vast and mighty land. I have a General who is my best friend. I believe in peace through strength, and I love to have a big army. I like to celebrate with wine and meats!
data.description:
You are in the The room at the top of the tower.
Small and round, the room is accessed by a spiral staircase. The room has stone walls, wooden floors and a decoratively carved wooden rocking chair next to a which looks over the castle's moat and the meadows and woodlands beyond.
There's a window, a wooden floors, a spiral staircase, a wall, a moat, a table, a meadow, and a woodland here.
The servant is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a diamond ring and a Cloak.

data.short_motivation: I am celebrating news of a victorious battle
data.mid_motivation: I want to show my men returning home that I will venerate their accomplishments
data.long_motivation: I want to promote the strength of my army by rewarding them greatly

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: go room at the top of the tower

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: give instructions of celebration to servant

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: drink lots of ale in preparation for the celebrations
